text: Maintain two separate copies of the database: — Master: Contains only changes from committed txns. — Shadow: Temporary database with changes made from uncommitted txns. Txns only make updates in the shadow copy. When a txn commits, atomically switch the shadow to become the new master. Buffer Pool Policy: NO-STEAL + FORCE SR \, £ZCMU-DB 4 à , 4 » PI o) 728:43/1:15:18 - NO-STEAL + FORCE > ® $ d O-c 20 - Database Logging Schemes (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
